In this article we will show the basic usage of `Herodotools` package by investigating the effects of deep past processes, here represented by diversification and
    historical dispersal, on the structure of assemblages of species of the genus *Akodon*. 


```{r install_pkg, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("GabrielNakamura/Herodotools", ref = "main")
```

To read the files corresponding to the distribution of species, phylogenetic relationship and trait values (represented by size) type:

```{r readData, echo=TRUE, eval=FALSE}
system.file("extdata", "Table_Akodon_coords_pa.txt", package = "Herodotools")
```
